game.name: Rough Ride
game.description:
For the bikers who love to travel through a different terrain instead of plain terrain one going to enjoy this game terrifically in an interesting and amazing manner in this online bike ride game. In this online biking game, it is for the champions of cross country and circuit racing that take participate into the zing zig-zag racing on the rough path would going to enjoy this particular bike racing game.

In rough bike ride games, the free online racing game the real challenge for a biker is to pass on from over the heap of stones, drums and other obstruction within a permissible time limit. However, in the game with a flip or some other way you can be crashed and lose the game. Though there are many opportunities in the game are offered in form of lives in the play online racing game, yet the success of crossing over the rough turf of the track in within the time is very necessary to get the most of the enjoyment from this free this online play racing games.

The next important part of this game is to achieve the success at the every level of the game irrespective of how difficult the game play may become. The relief for the gamers is in form of points and upgrades that promise them of any success in the following games and activities. Arrow keys are provided in the game for accelerating and other movements.
